entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat fails when Roslyn's dependencies move past our own. #32691
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686
  • APICompat tests fail with non english locale #32682
    Backlog
  • dotnet pack fails using UseArtifactsOutput=true with multi-targeting and global usings #32675
  • ServiceController's API got wrong service status #32668

Closed

  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
    Discussion
  • NETSDK1100 blocks building on Linux #3592
    Discussion
  • Build Issue with Latest SDK 7.0.302 #32637

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix StaticWebAssets Brotli asset deduplication #32700
    untriaged
  • [Blazor] Support loading the Blazor WebAssembly SDK when targeting net8.0-browser #32688
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update SDK in global.json to upgrade WebAssembly tests #32687
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • add two artifacts-output-related-telemetry properties to emitted events #32685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2183899 #32664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update MSBuildLocator version #32698
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32657
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32658
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Containers/Layer: trim x-bit based on filesystem permissions on Unix. #32606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/CreateNewImage: don't change the user to root when ContainerUser is empty. #32594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
